title: [LFM] Looking for Silver 1/2, Gold+ Players for Ranked 5's
body:
Hey Guys,

Looking for 3 guys to join a ranked 5's team to have some fun, 
Must have teamspeak,

Im Currently Gold 5, as well as my friend.
Just looking too learn/chill out whilst having some fun.

Hit me up on League "Toxiciex"

Cheers

replies.body:
IGN: A w00kie (try zero's and o's)
Roles: Anything; I prefer ADC or top (Riven ;) )
Chat: Will install anything to chat. Not very talkative though.
Add me if interested :D

ign is PRN

please add me so i can play with you guys

have teamspeak and mic, will talk but not talkative

will play any lane except jungle

thanks

Gday, 
if you are still looking for another member i'm keen to join.
Pref position: jungle and mid but very flexible.

Pref champs :{{champion:77}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:90}} 
IGN: STEEEEEVE (Plat 2)

teamspeak is go

cheers.

Hey^^ I'm also looking for a casual team to have fun with while still able to learn a bit. 
Pref Position: Supp 
Pref Champs: Thresh, Lulu, Janna, Sona
IGN: vanilla42
I don't have teamspeak yet but willing to install if you guys accept me:D
Thanks
